page.title: 02A WALK NEAR ASTWOOD BANK-1
page.content: The walk starts at the Ridgeway Middle School and goes down Edgioake Lane.There is a fence on one side of the road and a public footpath.It is muddy and you come out into a fruit field.This is quite a large field,but you soon come to the next.This is a grass field for grazing and so is the next.In the next field there is a line of elm trees which run down to the road.Looking westwards you can see for 80 miles. The Ridgeway was a horse track and was very dangerous because robbers used to live in the forest and robbed the people. The houses are in a ribbon development along the ridge.Many of the hedges in this area are over 400 years old.
